mapper.select: SELECT A.TEST_CD, A.LEC_CD, A.TEST_OPT, A.TEST_NM, A.TEST_CON, A.TEST_REG, A.TEST_DT, A.TEST_LMT , B.TEA_CD, B.TEST_CD, B.STU_CD, B.TEA_SCORE FROM TEST A LEFT JOIN TEST_APPLY B ON A.TEST_CD = B.TEST_CD WHERE A.LEC_CD = #{lecCd}
SELECT TEQ_CD, TEST_CD, TEQ_NO, TEQ_CON, TEQ_OP1, TEQ_OP2, TEQ_OP3, TEQ_OP4, TEQ_OP5, TEQ_ANSWER, TEQ_ALLOT FROM TEST_QUESTION WHERE TEST_CD = #{testCd} ORDER BY TEQ_NO
SELECT TEA_CD , TEST_CD , STU_CD , TEA_SCORE FROM TEST_APPLY WHERE TEST_CD = #{testCd} AND STU_CD = #{stuCd}
SELECT TEQ_CD , TEA_CD , TED_ANSWER , TED_YN FROM TEST_DETAIL WHERE TEA_CD = #{teaCd}
SELECT CRTR_CD FROM GRADE_CRITERIA WHERE LEC_CD = #{lecCd}
mapper.update: UPDATE LECTURE_GRADE A SET A.LECG_MS = ( SELECT B.TEA_SCORE FROM TEST_APPLY B, GRADE_CRITERIA C WHERE A.STU_CD = B.STU_CD AND A.CRTR_CD = C.CRTR_CD AND C.LEC_CD = SUBSTR(B.TEST_CD, 1, LENGTH(B.TEST_CD)-1) AND SUBSTR(B.TEST_CD,LENGTH(B.TEST_CD)) = '1' ) WHERE A.STU_CD = #{stuCd} AND A.CRTR_CD = #{crtrCd}

UPDATE LECTURE_GRADE A SET A.LECG_FS = ( SELECT B.TEA_SCORE FROM TEST_APPLY B, GRADE_CRITERIA C WHERE A.STU_CD = B.STU_CD AND A.CRTR_CD = C.CRTR_CD AND C.LEC_CD = SUBSTR(B.TEST_CD, 1, LENGTH(B.TEST_CD)-1) AND SUBSTR(B.TEST_CD,LENGTH(B.TEST_CD)) = '2' ) WHERE A.STU_CD = #{stuCd} AND A.CRTR_CD = #{crtrCd}
mapper.select: SELECT A.STU_CD, B.TEA_SCORE, B.TEA_CD, C.USER_NM STU_NM, D.DEP_NM , RANK() OVER (ORDER BY B.TEA_SCORE DESC NULLS LAST) RANK FROM ENROLMENT A LEFT JOIN TEST_APPLY B ON A.STU_CD = B.STU_CD AND B.TEST_CD = #{testCd}, USERS C, DEPARTMENT D WHERE A.LEC_CD = #{lecCd} AND A.STU_CD = C.USER_CD AND SUBSTR(D.DEP_CD, 6, 3) = SUBSTR(A.STU_CD, 3, 3)
SELECT TEA_CD , TEST_CD , STU_CD , TEA_SCORE FROM TEST_APPLY WHERE TEA_CD = #{teaCd}
